parameters.name: DomainName
parameters.description: The streaming domain. You can query one or more domain names. If you specify multiple domain names, separate them with commas (,). If you leave this parameter empty, the data of all domain names within your Alibaba Cloud account is returned.

parameters.name: EndTime
parameters.description: The end of the time range to query. The end time must be later than the start time. Specify the time in the ISO 8601 standard in the *yyyy-MM-dd*T*HH:mm:ss*Z format. The time must be in UTC.

parameters.name: Interval
parameters.description:
The time granularity of the query. Unit: seconds. Valid values:

*   **300** (default)
*   **3600**
*   **86400**

> 

*   If you specify an invalid value or do not specify this parameter, the default value **300** is used.

*   When the time granularity is **300** seconds, the returned bandwidth is the average bandwidth within the 300 seconds.
*   When the time granularity is **3600** or **86400** seconds, the returned bandwidth is the peak value of all average bandwidths within each 300-second period.

parameters.name: IspNameEn
parameters.description: The name of the Internet service provider (ISP). You can call the [DescribeCdnRegionAndIsp](~~91077~~) operation to query a list of available ISPs.

parameters.name: LocationNameEn
parameters.description: The name of the region. You can call the [DescribeCdnRegionAndIsp](~~91077~~) operation to query a list of available regions.

parameters.name: StartTime
parameters.description: The beginning of the time range to query. Specify the time in the ISO 8601 standard in the *yyyy-MM-dd*T*HH:mm:ss*Z format. The time must be in UTC.
